headline: Reasons to Retain BSX Stock in Your Portfolio for Now
summary: Investors remain optimistic about Boston Scientific due to its geographical expansions and impressive acquisitions.

headline: BSX Stock Gains From Positive OPTION Trial Data for WATCHMAN FLX
summary: Boston Scientific announces favorable OPTION trial results for its WATCHMAN FLX LAAC device. In terms of stroke risk reduction, WATCHMAN FLX is found to be superior to OAC therapy.

raw.headline: BSX Stock Gains From Positive OPTION Trial Data for WATCHMAN FLX

headline: Boston Scientific Stock Set to Gain From Completion of Axonics Deal
summary: BSX's acquisition of Axonics marks its entry into sacral neuromodulation and complements its Urology business.

headline: Fidelity Select Health Care Portfolio Q3 2024 Fund Review
